get.description: Lists all brands, along with their IDs, matching query term. Does not support wildcards. Limit is 10 results per query. This API does not consume any credits.

parameters.description: Search term to match against brand name. Partial match. Case insensitive.
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

get.summary: Search Brands - Lists all brands along with their IDs - Credits: 　0

get.description: API returns the status  of  the bulk  Job. This API does not consume any credits.

parameters.description: The id that would be used to query the status of the submitted job and download the final products
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

get.summary: ASE Bulk - Get job status - Credits: 　0

get.description: API downloads the products as a file. This API does not consume any credits.

parameters.description: The id that would be used to query the status of the submitted job and download the final products
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

get.description: API returns the status  of  the bulk  Job. This API does not consume any credits.

parameters.description: The id that would be used to query the status of the submitted job and download the final products
parameters.name: jobId

parameters.description: Your application id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

get.description: API downloads the products as a file. This API does not consume any credits.

post.description: This operation returns the catalog premium information for the specified product across all the stores where it is sold at. This consumes 18 credits per product returned.

parameters.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesn’t pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data
parameters.name: countryCode
file

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

post.summary: Bulk Product Details - Returns catalog premium information for a product - Credits: 　n x 18

post.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, url, upc, mpn, sku, brandId, storeId, or categoryId. This consumes 18 credits per product returned.

parameters.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesn’t pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data
parameters.name: countryCode

parameters.description: Limits results to products sold at store with id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: storeId

parameters.description: Combined with storeId limits results to products sold at both storeIds and alsoSoldAt storeIds. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: alsoSoldAt

parameters.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int.  Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: brandId

parameters.description: Limits results to products of category with this id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: categoryId

parameters.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: startPrice

parameters.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: endPrice

parameters.description: Limits results to either in-stock or out-of-stock items. Accepted values: 'IN_STOCK','OUT_OF_STOCK'
parameters.name: availability

parameters.description: Limits results to product that have price history available through the products/{:id}/prices endpoint. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: priceHistoryAvailable

parameters.description: Limits results to products whose prices have been increased or decreased. Accepted Values: PRICE_INCREASED, PRICE_DECREASED, EITHER
parameters.name: priceChange

parameters.description: Limits results to products which are on Promotion. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: onPromotion

parameters.description: Limits results to products which have price recorded in the last xx days. Accepted Value is a non-negative integer
parameters.name: lastRecordedIn

parameters.description: Limits results to products with at least a certain number of stores
parameters.name: storesCount

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which the offer level filter apply. Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)
parameters.name: applyFiltersTo

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)
parameters.name: selectOffersFrom

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

post.summary: Bulk Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters with their catalog info across stores - Credits: 　n x 18

get.description: Returns a collection of products matching a specified query, along with a variety of statistics about the query results. Requires at least one of query, url, upc, mpn, sku, brandId, storeId, or categoryId. This consumes 18 credits per product returned.

parameters.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesn’t pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data
parameters.name: countryCode

parameters.description: The product search term
parameters.name: q

parameters.description: Limits results to products sold at store with id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: storeId

parameters.description: Combined with storeId limits results to products sold at both storeIds and alsoSoldAt storeIds. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: alsoSoldAt

parameters.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: brandId

parameters.description: Limits results to products of category with this id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: categoryId

parameters.description: Search by product URL
parameters.name: url

parameters.description: Limit results to products with this UPC
parameters.name: upc

parameters.description: Limit results to products with this MPN
parameters.name: mpn

parameters.description: Limit results to products with this SKU
parameters.name: sku

parameters.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: startPrice

parameters.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: endPrice

parameters.description: Limits results to either in-stock or out-of-stock items. Accepted values: 'IN_STOCK','OUT_OF_STOCK'
parameters.name: availability

parameters.description: Limits results to product that have price history available through the products/{:id}/prices endpoint. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: priceHistoryAvailable

parameters.description: Limits results to products whose prices have been increased or decreased. Accepted Values: PRICE_INCREASED, PRICE_DECREASED, EITHER
parameters.name: priceChange

parameters.description: Limits results to products which are on Promotion. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: onPromotion

parameters.description: Limits results to products which have price recorded in the last xx days. Accepted Value is a non-negative integer
parameters.name: lastRecordedIn

parameters.description: Limits results to products with at least a certain number of stores
parameters.name: storesCount

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which the offer level filter apply. Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)
parameters.name: applyFiltersTo

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)
parameters.name: selectOffersFrom

parameters.description: Sort by values - PRICE_LOW_TO_HIGH, PRICE_HIGH_TO_LOW, MOST_RECENT.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: Facet by values - storeId, brandId, categoryId. Should be a comma separated list of allowed values.
parameters.name: facetBy

parameters.description: The page number of the result set to return. 10 results per page.
parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: Number of results per page. Allowed values - 10, 20, 50.
parameters.name: pageSize

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

get.summary: Search Products - Retrieves a list of products matching a variety of query parameters with their catalog info across stores - Credits: 　n x 18

get.description: This operation returns the catalog premium information for the specified product across all the stores where it is sold at. This consumes 18 credits.

parameters.description: Limits results to products of the geography with this code. Available values 'US', 'GB', 'IN', 'CA', 'SG' and 'AU'. If the user doesn’t pass a value, the default option returns the US countryCode data
parameters.name: countryCode

parameters.description: The Indix product identifier - should be a 32-digit HEX value retrieved via the Product Search API

parameters.name: pageNumber

parameters.description: Your application id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key

parameters.description: Limits results to products of brand with id int.  Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: brandId

parameters.description: Limits results to products of category with this id. Supports multiple values (acts as OR operator)
parameters.name: categoryId

parameters.description: Combined with end_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: startPrice

parameters.description: Combined with start_price, limits results to products sold by at least one store at a price between start and end
parameters.name: endPrice

parameters.description: Limits results to either in-stock or out-of-stock items. Accepted values: 'IN_STOCK','OUT_OF_STOCK'
parameters.name: availability

parameters.description: Limits results to product that have price history available through the products/{:id}/prices endpoint. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: priceHistoryAvailable

parameters.description: Limits results to products whose prices have been increased or decreased. Accepted Values: PRICE_INCREASED, PRICE_DECREASED, EITHER
parameters.name: priceChange

parameters.description: Limits results to products which are on Promotion. Accepted values: 'true','false'
parameters.name: onPromotion

parameters.description: Limits results to products which have price recorded in the last xx days. Accepted Value is a non-negative integer
parameters.name: lastRecordedIn

parameters.description: Limits results to products with at least a certain number of stores
parameters.name: storesCount

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which the offer level filter apply. Allowed values - storeId (apply filters to only stores in storeId), alsoSoldAt (apply filters to only stores in alsoSoldAt), storeIdOrAlsoSoldAt (apply filters to stores present in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), any (apply filters across all offers)
parameters.name: applyFiltersTo

parameters.description: Specify the stores for which offers will be returned in the response. Allowed values - storeId (select offers matching filters from storeId), alsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from alsoSoldAt), storeIdAndAlsoSoldAt (select offers matching filters from stores in both storeId and alsoSoldAt), all (select all offers irrespective of matching or storeId or alsoSoldAt data)
parameters.name: selectOffersFrom

parameters.description: Your application id
parameters.name: app_id

parameters.description: Your application key
parameters.name: app_key
